name: Evolution Slime v0.01
description:
So far I've only made some sprites and wanted to show my friend how it all looks as of now. :3

Evo Slime, Slime Evoulition.. Whatever this game is supposed to be called, is supposed to be a game where you take the control of a slime from the moment it hatches out of its egg. You will then be able to consume things around you, which will give you experience and then with the gained experience and ressources you've consumed you will be able to alter yourself.... That is, for the future. Right now all you can do is move around in this one part of the cave.
